医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
揭开双相情感障碍的遗传密码研究人员研究了分类和维度双相情感障碍模型之间的遗传关联和遗传力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Unraveling-the-genic-code-of-bipolar-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Unraveling-the-genic-code-of-bipolar-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36b798ea-18e1-4377-b38d-9bae9296bcc3 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 04:10:00 -0400 Unraveling the genetic code of bipolar disorder
探索身体健康的男性和女性表观遗传衰老与肠道微生物组组成之间的关系研究人员研究了身体健康个体的肠道微生物组、身体健康和表观遗传衰老之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Exploring-the-relationship- Between-epigenic-aging-and-gut-microbiome-composition-in-physically-fit-men-and-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Exploring-the-relationship- Between-epigenic-aging-and-gut-microbiome-composition-in-physically-fit-men-and-women.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=266df577-3722-4462-8a18-f08e4b9c718d Fri, 14 Jul 2023 03:55:00 -0400 Exploring the relationship between epigenetic aging and gut microbiome composition in physically fit men and women
社交媒体平台可以教育和指导美国有色人种青少年健康体重管理一项新研究发现，社交媒体平台，尤其是 TikTok 和 Instagram，是教育和指导美国有色人种年轻人进行健康体重管理并最终减少肥胖方面的种族不平等的理想场所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Social-media-platforms-can-educate-and-guide-US-youth-of-color-on-healthy-weight-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Social-media-platforms-can-educate-and-guide-US-youth-of-color-on-healthy-weight-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=635af05f-e012-4c3d-b33c-cc458f91f968 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 23:52:00 -0400 Social media platforms can educate and guide US youth of color on healthy weight management
C-Path 和 Vivpro 联手推进药物开发Critical Path Institute 是一家全球领先的非营利组织，致力于通过加速监管认可的解决方案来加速药物开发，今天宣布与行业领先的革命性生物智能软件平台和创新服务提供商 Vivpro 签署新的正式谅解备忘录。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/C-Path-and-Vivpro-join-forces-to-advance-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/C-Path-and-Vivpro-join-forces-to-advance-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb75c300-f591-48a8-8596-a2e5ccc5b361 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 22:57:07 -0400 C-Path and Vivpro join forces to advance drug development
超级老人比一般老年人更有可能拥有更快的移动速度能够回忆起日常事件和生活经历的 80 多岁的人以及年轻 20 至 30 岁的人（称为超级老人）也更有可能比典型的老年人拥有更快的运动速度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Superagers-more-likely-to-have-greater-movement-speed-than-典型-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Superagers-more-likely-to-have-greater-movement-speed-than-典型-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=940cb98c-978e-4cae-9562-f09015f254f4 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 22:52:00 -0400 Superagers more likely to have greater movement speed than typical older adults
AI 工具可在几秒钟内准确计算 MRI 扫描中的脑部病变德克萨斯大学圣安东尼奥健康科学中心开发的人工智能 (AI) 工具可在几秒钟内通过 MRI 扫描准确计数脑部病变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/AI-tool-accurately-counts-brain-lesions-on-MRI-scans-within-seconds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/AI-tool-accurately-counts-brain-lesions-on-MRI-scans-within-seconds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0714810-cf29-42c9-b81d-c5ee873cdc8b Thu, 13 Jul 2023 22:41:00 -0400 AI tool accurately counts brain lesions on MRI scans within seconds
多学科质量改进项目降低婴儿体温过低率实施多学科综合治疗后，新生儿重症监护病房 (NICU) 婴儿在到达手术室 (OR) 时和手术过程中任何时刻出现体温过低的比例分别从 48.7% 下降到 6.4%，从 67.5% 下降到 37.4%芝加哥 Ann & Robert H. Lurie 儿童医院的质量改进项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Multisubject-quality-improvement-project-reduces-infant-hypothermia-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Multisubject-quality-improvement-project-reduces-infant-hypothermia-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43b1c2f7-fed8-47a5-b0f6-8609472d5ca1 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 22:37:00 -0400 Multidisciplinary quality improvement project reduces infant hypothermia rates
MemTrax 连续识别测试显示出早期检测阿尔茨海默病的希望一篇新的社论论文发表在《Aging》（被 MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 的“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 12 期，题为“Advancing Screening forgnition Damage: the memtrax持续识别测试。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/MemTrax-continuous-recognition-test-shows-promise-in-early-detection-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/MemTrax-continuous-recognition-test-shows-promise-in-early-detection-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8e0f527-1c82-4e42-9703-0c4115265eea Thu, 13 Jul 2023 22:32:00 -0400 MemTrax continuous recognition test shows promise in early detection of Alzheimer's disease
巨噬细胞可能在心房颤动的发展中发挥重要作用心房颤动 (AFib) 是一种常见的心脏病，其特征是快速且不规则的心跳，可导致中风和心力衰竭，目前的治疗方法具有多种副作用，并且无法有效预防 AFib 复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Macrophages-may-play-a-major-role-in-the-development-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Macrophages-may-play-a-major-role-in-the-development-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67a46ac2-1bd2-4a1e-9702-5a5a5ba6f21e Thu, 13 Jul 2023 20:46:15 -0400 Macrophages may play a major role in the development of atrial fibrillation
概要报告提高了晚期卵巢癌治疗前 CT 报告的完整性根据《美国伦琴学杂志》(AJR) 上发表的一篇已接受的手稿，一份概要报告提高了晚期卵巢癌患者治疗前 CT 报告的完整性，包括已确定的不可切除或难以切除的疾病部位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Synoptic-reports-improve-completeness-of-pretreatment-CT-reports-in-advanced-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Synoptic-reports-improve-completeness-of-pretreatment-CT-reports-in-advanced-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc2b044c-d90c-449a-af32-dbe5f77e7d96 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 20:32:09 -0400 Synoptic reports improve completeness of pretreatment CT reports in advanced ovarian cancer
